name: SUKTMIG2D
description: Prestack time migration of a common-offset section with the double-square root (DSR) operator

parameter_descriptions.vfile: RMS velocity file (units/s) v(t,x) as a function of time
parameter_descriptions.firstcdp: First cdp number in velocity file
parameter_descriptions.lastcdp: Last cdp number in velocity file (from header)
parameter_descriptions.dcdp: Number of cdps between consecutive traces (from header)
parameter_descriptions.angmax: Maximum aperture angle for migration (degrees), default = 40
parameter_descriptions.nfc: Number of Fourier-coefficients to approximate low-pass filters
parameter_descriptions.fwidth: High-end frequency increment for the low-pass filters in Hz, default = 5
